    • loadInventoryRecord

      private InventoryController.InventoryRecord loadInventoryRecord(String name)
      Loads all inventory items from the database.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the inventory item to load
      Returns:
      InventoryRecord or null if not found
      Throws:
      Exception - if database loading fails

    • insertInventoryItem

      private boolean insertInventoryItem(String name, int quantity, BigDecimal restockPrice)
      Insert inventory row, retrying once after resyncing the identity sequence if a duplicate-key error occurs. Returns true on success.
      Parameters:
      name - the inventory item name
      quantity - the quantity
      restockPrice - the restock price
      Returns:
      boolean indicating success

      Loads and switches to a new scene.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event
      classpathPath - the classpath path to the FXML file
